channel.title: Usenet New Zealand
channel.description: Recent content on Usenet New Zealand

item.title: Usenet New Zealand
item.description: The domain usenet.net.nz is owned by Simon Lyall and are used to host various projects and resources Previously it hosted some various services related to Usenet especially the “nz.*” newsgroups but this has not been the case for many years. The name however has been kept. Simon’s Sites Simon Lyall’s homepage Simon Lyall’s blog Simon Lyall’s old homepage Other Sites Hosted Auckland Thursday Night Curry The Auckland Chess Centre Tolkien New Zealand The linux.
